title: Update web3-provider-engine to match web3-provider-engine v15.0.12
body:
- [ ] I've asked for help in the [Truffle Gitter](http://gitter.im/Consensys/truffle) before filing this issue.

---------------------------

## Issue

The following error trace is caused by Infura returning an invalid block (and not returning an error). Metamask has fixed this issue in v15.0.12 (https://github.com/MetaMask/web3-provider-engine/issues/313).

## Steps to Reproduce

Wait for Infura to screw up (I guess you could make a dummy endpoint that returned a null block)

## Expected Behavior

There should be no exception; we should just wait for a successful block

## Actual Results

Throws because the block is null, which crashes the entire app.

[web   ]                                                  ^

[web   ]     at XMLHttpRequest._setReadyState (/var/app/current/node_modules/xhr2-cookies/xml-http-request.ts:219:8)
[web   ]     at XMLHttpRequest._onHttpResponseEnd (/var/app/current/node_modules/xhr2-cookies/xml-http-request.ts:345:8)

## Environment

* Operating System: Docker (linux)
* Ethereum client: hd-wallet-provider
* Truffle version (`truffle version`): 1.0.36
Thanks for the heads up @paulbarclay ! @ltfschoen has a fix for this in https://github.com/trufflesuite/provider-engine/pull/6. Closing as a duplicate of #3130 .

Until this goes out in our official weekly release, the fix for this is out at `@truffle/hdwallet-provider@next`.

Please give it a shot and let us know if this particular error has been resolved! 🙏
